options.content:
# Grafana Incident Insights
Smart performance overview
A high-level overview of the most significant data for a quick and comprehensive view of your organization's IRM performance.

panels.description: Incidents marked with the "security" label are counted on this panel
panels.title: Security incidents

panels.description: This metric represents the average duration of all incidents from start to finish
panels.title: Mean time to resolve (MTTR)

options.content: Gain a better understanding of how consistently your organization follows standard incident response processes with these insights.

panels.description: Incidents marked with the "PIR" label are counted on this panel
panels.title: Post-Incident Report completion of $labels

options.content: Use the sorting and filtering options to analyze specific incident data and drill down into the details.
